statements: UPDATE IoT_Device_Security SET privacy_status='Public' WHERE device_id=1;
UPDATE IoT_Device_Security SET security_level='High', privacy_status='Private' WHERE device_id=2;
UPDATE IoT_Device_Security SET device_name = 'SmartLock Pro', security_level = 'High' WHERE device_id = 1
UPDATE IoT_Device_Security SET privacy_status = 'Public', security_level = 'Medium', device_name = 'SecurityCamera HD' WHERE device_id = 2
UPDATE IoT_Device SET security_score=80, privacy_score=90 WHERE device_id='12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789abc';
UPDATE Compliance_Status SET compliance_score=95, compliance_date='2022-09-15' WHERE device_id='87654321-4321-4321-4321-210987654321';
UPDATE IoT_Device SET security_score = 80, privacy_score = 90 WHERE device_id = '5142259f-32c2-484d-af25-c4601ad937fd';
UPDATE Compliance_Status SET compliance_score = 95, compliance_date = '2022-08-15', compliance_status = 'Compliant' WHERE device_id = '1788c5ff-9515-4a2e-8921-43958ad3fe5a';
UPDATE iot_devices SET security_status = 'Secured', privacy_status = 'Public' WHERE device_id = 1;
UPDATE iot_locations SET organization_id = 2 WHERE location_id = 3;
UPDATE organizations SET industry_type = 'Healthcare' WHERE organization_name = 'Hospital Corp';
UPDATE iot_devices SET security_status = 'Secure', privacy_status = 'Private' WHERE device_id = 1;
UPDATE IoT_Devices SET firmware_version = 'V2.0', last_check_in = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE device_id = 1;
UPDATE Device_Privacy SET data_encryption = TRUE, data_anonymization = TRUE, data_retention_period = '6 months', data_privacy_policy = 'Strict privacy policy' WHERE device_id = 2;
UPDATE IoT_Devices SET manufacturer = 'XYZ Corp', location = 'New York' WHERE device_id = 101;
UPDATE Device_Security SET encryption_enabled = TRUE, antivirus_installed = TRUE, antivirus_last_scan = '2022-07-15 08:00:00' WHERE security_id = 201;
UPDATE devices SET location = 'Room A', status = 'Active' WHERE device_id = 123;
UPDATE privacy_issues SET issue_type = 'Privacy Breach', resolution_status = 'Resolved' WHERE issue_id = 456;
UPDATE devices SET status = 'Active' WHERE device_id = 1;
UPDATE device_data SET data_value = '90%' WHERE data_id = 5;
